object.name: FAQ.How do I set up a standalone instance of PhenoTips

property.answer:
To set up a standalone instance of PhenoTips, download and extract the all-in-one package from the [[Downloads page>>PhenoTips.Download]]. Then run the ##start.sh## (Linux or OS X) or ##start.bat## (Windows).
Alternately, you may download, install, and run the ##.dmg## for OS X. A fully working instance of PhenoTips will open in your default browser, ready for use.
You may create an account, add patient records, and save data locally.
Note that by default PhenoTips comes with a default administrative account which you can use for customizing PhenoTips according to your needs. The username is ##Admin## and the password is ##admin##, both case sensitive.
{{warning}}You should change the password for the default ##Admin## account.{{/warning}}
